l.s: samāśrayosamāśrayaāśrayo yaṃ haṭho mataḥhaṭho maṭhaḥmato haṭhaḥ/
samyaggomaya sāndrasārdrasāṃrdraliptam amalaṃlīptam amalaṃliptavimalaṃliptam abilaṃ niḥśeṣanirdoṣabādhojjhitamjantūjjhitam/

ttattvajñānāc ca darśanātjñānā ca darśanātjñānād viniścayāt/
ṣaḍbhiryogastu sidhyatiyogaś ca sidhyatiyoga prasidhyatiyogaḥ prasidhyatiyogo prasidhyati//
n abhibhavati cana bhavatinaptibhavati ca doṣānāsanaṃdoṣānāśanarogānāsanaṃ śrīmayūram/
śayanaṃ tu śavāsanamśayanaṃ ca śavāsanamśavāsanam idaṃ smṛtam/
śreṣṭhaṃ tatrāpi ca sukhetatrāpi ca sukhaṃtatrāpi ca sakhetathāpi bhadraṃ [ca]tatra dvayaṃ tiṣṭhet
yonisthānakadvārakam aṅghrimūlam aṅghrimūlāmūlam aṅghrimūlāṅghrighaṭitaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ vinyase
nmeḍhremadhye pādam athaikapādatathaikammāsyahṛdayeeva hṛdayeeva niyataṃ dhṛtvākṛtvā samaṃ vigraham/
siddhāḥ siddhāsanaṃsiddhā siddhāsanaṃsiddhā siddhāsanasiddhāsanam idaṃ viduḥ//
śramadair bahubhiḥśramādau bahubhiḥkim ādyair bahubhiḥśramadairghyādibhiḥ pīṭhaiḥ
vāmorūpari dakṣiṇaṃ cadakṣaṇaṃ cavidakṣiṇaṃ hi caraṇaṃ saṃsthāpya vāmaṃ tathātato
yāmyovāmodakṣojānvojāmvaujānūrūpari paścimena vidhinātasya bandhanavidhau dhṛtvāpṛṣṭe karābhyāṃ dṛḍham/
aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukaṃ.. .. kaṃ nāsāgramālokaye

l.s: kṛtvādhṛtvā sampuṭitau karau dṛḍhataraṃ baddhvā tuca padmāsanaṃ
gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi sannidhāyasaṃvidhāya cibukaṃ dhyānaṃ ca tatataśccetasicepsitaṃ/

mārutaṃ dhārayet yas tupīyate yas tupīvyate yas tupibati yastuyas tu pibati

ājāviajāviajādimāṃsadadhitakrakulatthakulathakulatthyakulacchakolakodrakoṣṇākola is glossed as bhaṭavāsa in J8.

s.note: paṭolaka is glossed as palavala in J8. Cf. Brahmānanda’s comm.: paṭolakaphalaṃ paravara iti bhāṣāyāṃ prasiddhaṃ.
